definition: to want absolutely/to insist on (doing something)
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to demand/to request/to coerce

sentences.english: Come and look round our shop without commitment to buy anything.
sentences.chinese: 請隨時來我們商店轉轉，不一定非要買東西。

sentences.english: Rich client development doesn't have to come at your code's expense.
sentences.chinese: 富客戶機開發並不一定非要以複雜的代碼爲代價。

sentences.english: Why use plastic when you can use wood?
sentences.chinese: 既然能用朔料，何必非要用木料呢？

sentences.english: So that there's no one rule this way or that way.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沒有一個固定的規則說非要這樣不可。

sentences.english: Dang, Cletus, why'd you have to park by my parents?
sentences.chinese: 克萊特斯，你爲什麼非要停在我爸媽家門口？

sentences.english: But that year the Spring Festival, wrapped around his death, hard grind, she must go back with him.
sentences.chinese: 可那年的春節，他死纏硬磨，非要她隨他一起回去。

sentences.english: Do bathroom cleaners need to be so harsh that the fumes make me choke?
sentences.chinese: 浴室清潔劑的氣味非要搞得弄濃烈的讓人窒息嗎？

sentences.english: If the buyer had insisted back, then take at least one postage.
sentences.chinese: 如果買家非要退得話，那至少得承擔一次郵費。

sentences.english: No you dnt have to marry a girl if u get them pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 不，即使你讓她們懷孕了你也不一定非要娶那個女孩。

sentences.english: If you have to give a time-limit to this love, I hope it is 10 thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 如果非要在這段感情上加一個期限，我希望是一萬年。

sentences.english: If there must have a time frame to that love, I hope it will strech ten thousands years!
sentences.chinese: 如果非要給這段愛加一個期限，我希望是一萬年。

sentences.english: He always comes and tells Betram that he must stop his wife from getting married again.
sentences.chinese: 纏着他非要其阻止自己妻子再婚不可。

sentences.english: Why to don't want the whole body covered with wounds that ego move.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼非要把自己動的遍體鱗傷。

sentences.english: Why did they insist to publish so high GDP value every year.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼他們非要把咱每年的GDP值報得老高呀？

sentences.english: If you have to give a time limit to this love, Ihope it is 10 thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 借使非要在這段前加個期限的話，我夢想是一萬年。

definition: (followed by a verb phrase, then – optionally – 不可, or 不行 etc) must
firmly set on doing sth/to insist on doing/determined in one's course of action
to insist on doing sth/must do it, despite everything
to be determined to/to insist on
(coll.) if

(indicates that sth turns out just the opposite of what one would wish) unfortunately/as it happened/(indicates that sth is the opposite of what would be normal or reasonable) stubbornly/contrarily/against reason/(indicates that sb or a group is singled out) precisely/only/of all people
otherwise/or else/or
since/as/this being the case
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
there is no need/why should
otherwise/or else/how about...?/either... (or...)
not so/no/or else/otherwise/if not/How about ...?
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
won't do/be out of the question/be no good/not work/not be capable
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
obviously/plainly/undoubtedly/definitely
